text: Professor Atiqul Islam is a Bangladeshi academic. He is the current Vice- chancellor of North South University. ==Education and career== Islam has bachelor's and master's degrees from the University of Dhaka. He obtained another master's from the University of New South Wales and a Ph.D. from the University of Sydney. Professor Atiqul Islam served as the pro-vice-chancellor of Edith Cowan University in Australia and the Dean of the Faculty of Business and Government at the University of Canberra. He is a fellow of CPA Australia and a member of the Institute of Chartered Accountants in Australia and New Zealand. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bangladeshi academics Category:University of Dhaka alumni Category:University of New South Wales alumni Category:University of Sydney alumni Category:Vice-Chancellors of North South University Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:North South University faculty
title: Atique Islam
